reviews.text: where do i start
reviews.title: hell

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: walls paper thin can here absolutely everything from rooms both sides so dont intend in getting any sleep
reviews.title: Good for a cheap break

reviews.text: air con turned off in middle of night so room hot all day
reviews.title: Great Value for money and soooo clean

reviews.text: food bland
reviews.title: Small Pool, Good Food!

reviews.text: pool too small for amount of guests
reviews.title: Fine for a good value family holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arrived back home last night .......a day early so we could get some sleep, the walls in the Hotel are paper thin, all the people we spoke to said they would never go back to this hotel. I could go on about this hotel but I'm too tired ZZZZZZZZZ
reviews.title: Never Again

reviews.text: stayed at calella palace for one week, unsure of what to expect, but found the wholeholiday at this hotel was excellent, the staff were very good and very helpfull ,the rooms were cleaned daily and towells and bathrooms were cleaned daily . the food was good with a good selection, the food was,allways hot and the dining room was lovely , and again the staff were very good. the entertainment was good ,and childrens entertainment very good, the shuttle bus to other resorts was excellent service as was the use of other hotels in htop group whilst vissiting other resorts, the walls of hotel are quite thin so take ear plugs, and the roof top sun terrace is great if you want a good tan, my rating for this hotel is 9 out 10 an overall great relaxing cmfortable holiday,
reviews.title: brill hotel,staff great food good it was a great hotel for a good holiday

reviews.text: after returning from calella palace 13/05/09 i would just like to say this hotel is nice. we have had a pleasant stay here and will definately be going back. the food is nice and there is something for everybody. the rooms are clean and the staff are friendly and helpful. when we arrived due to a mix up with the travel agent we were only booked in for 1 bedroom instead of 2. the reception staff sorted it immediately. the hottubs on the roof (over 18s) are lovely and refreshing. fresh towels daily and bed linen changed every other day. the hotel is exceptionally clean.would recomend to others.
reviews.title: enjoyable stay. would definately visit again.

reviews.text: stayed here with mam and 3 year old son.
reviews.title: fun for the family

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: was great, kids club and entertainment fab for little ones, a happy child means a happy parent.
reviews.title: Nice and relaxing short stay - what you expect for what you pay!!
Hotel fine - food greasy - full of German students
reviews.text: Just returned from holiday in Costa Brava. Luckily we were able to be moved after three days. Students were letting off fire extinguishers, vomiting over balconies - just ruined everything. As I said we were moved to Pineda Palace in Pineda which was absolutely great.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the bar staff are so rude to young people my daughter and son was there with there partners good job me and there father wasnt there same time cos im sure they wouldnt of been so rude but what goes around comes around it wont be the last xxx
reviews.title: bar staff all want sacking

reviews.text: I have got to say that I thought this hotel to be great value for the money that we paid, as I went to hand my accommodation vouchers in there was a large group of young students booking in at the same time and my heart sank after reading previous reviews regarding large groups of them, they where warned to keep the noise down and no shouting after 11pm and i have got to say they were very behaved and i for one heard no noise from them.
reviews.title: NICE HOTEL, CLEAN & TIDY ROOMS, FOOD & DRINK PLENTIFUL, SHAME STAFF DON'T KNOW HOW TO SMILE!!

reviews.text: The walls between rooms are thin but we seemed to be on the family floor and had no noisy neighbours, in fact the only person waking me up was my 14yr old son snoring!!!
reviews.title: Pigs Cheeks for Dinner!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food served in the restaurant was tasty and there was plenty to choose from so i don't know why there have been so many complaints, at the end of the day your in Spain so expect Spanish dishes. If you go AI then just so you know you have to take all your meals AND snacks in the restaurant as there is no poolside snack bar.
reviews.title: Very Good - but Noisy at night!!!

reviews.text: Think twice before you book this hotel!!!!!! We had absolutely NO sleep whatsoever for 2 out of the 3 nights we stayed thanks to a large group of German Students running riot! They had absolutely no respect for the hotel or for other guests. They had obviously taken advantage of the free bar and were knocking on peoples doors, slamming doors, ringing random rooms, shouting, screaming aswell as smoking drugs. Firsly, we would not have expected the hotel to have accomodated such a large group of youngsters and secondly you would expect a 4 star hotel to have some kind of security! We, like other people on our floor complained about them to reception who responded by saying that Security were aware but they had other floors to patrol and unless there was blood shed there was nothing they or the police could do!!!!!!! If you want to feel secure while you are on holiday then don't go here!
reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Other aspects of the hotel were also less than you would expect from a 4 star. We were maybe being naive but expected "All Inclusive" to be exactly that! If you want to use the safe then you have to pay, if you wanted to use the laundary room or iron you have to pay and you even had to pay for the TV! You do get some of the deposites back but that's surely not the point! The maids came every day and emptied the bins and made the beds however we also expected them to give us more sachets of shampoo and shower gel but nope, one was all we were given for the whole 3 nights!
reviews.title: Great hotel, enjoyable stay. Cant wait to go back.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On a slightly better note, the food was ok,pretty basic and the location of the hotel was good, handy for the beach,train station and shops.
reviews.title: Looking for sun, sea and the serenity of silence? Be prepared to look a little further.

reviews.text: You make your own mind up, we may have just been unlucky but generally, if the hotel doesn't react to the numerous complaints of their guests especially when it comes to being safe while you sleep then i'd say they don't deserve the 4 star rating!
reviews.title: Absolutely awful - 2 star at most

reviews.text: My husband and I stopped at the calella palace in may for his 40th birthday. We went for four days. Our room was on the third floor, and we had a nice view. Our room was lovely and spacious. Two double beds in the room. A decent sized bathroom. The maid service was excellent. Clean towels provided in the room every day, and the room cleaned every day. There is a portable tv in the rooms with a few english channels. But if you want to watch the tv you have to go to the reception and give them your name and room number and it is a £20 deposit for the remote. You do get the full deposit back when you hand the remote back in.
reviews.title: Pretty good hotel,worth the money.
